ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser

Class JColorWheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser.JColorWheel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JColorWheel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The JColorWheel displays a hue/saturation wheel of the HSB color model. The user can click at the wheel to pick a color on the JColorWheel. The JColorWheel should be used together with a HSB brightness color slider.
    Version:
    $Id: JColorWheel.java 462 2014-03-22 09:23:12Z wrandelshofer $
    Author:
    Werner Randelshofer
    See Also:
